mapper.sql: id, order_code, trade_no, order_total, goods_count, delivery_type, delivery_fee, user_id, user_name, status, create_date, update_date, pay_time, pay_code, pay_type, team_id, contact, address_id, point_id, receive_date, refund_amount, order_desc, goods_total,vip_order,vip_fee,refund_date
mapper.select:
SELECT oi.id id, oi.order_code order_code, tb.team_name team_name, ui.nick_name nick_name, ui.contact contact, oi.user_name user_name, oi.create_date create_date, oi.order_total order_total, oi.refund_amount refund_amount, oi.receive_date receive_date, oi.pay_time pay_time, oi.delivery_fee delivery_fee, dp.point_name point_name, oi.status status, oi.trade_no trade_no, oi.delivery_type delivery_type, tb.logistics_type logistics_type FROM order_info oi left join delivery_point dp on oi.point_id=dp.id left join team_buying tb on oi.team_id=tb.id left join user_info ui on tb.user_id=ui.id WHERE
oi.id = #{id} and
oi.order_code = #{order_code} and
oi.user_name = #{user_name} and
ui.nick_name = #{nick_name} and
tb.team_name = #{team_name} and
oi.status = #{status} and
oi.delivery_type = #{delivery_type} and
tb.logistics_type = #{logistics_type} and
oi.create_date > #{satrt_date} and
#{end_date} > oi.create_date and
1=1 order by oi.create_date desc

SELECT SUM(coin_num) AS coin_num,SUM(order_total) AS order_total FROM trade_order t,user_info u,user_info u2 WHERE t.seller_id = u.id AND t.buyer_id = u2.id and
1=1

SELECT count(*) FROM trade_order t,user_info u,user_info u2 WHERE t.seller_id = u.id AND t.buyer_id = u2.id and
1=1

SELECT t.order_code,t.coin_num,t.coin_price,t.order_total,t.create_date,t.trade_date, u.real_name AS seller_name,u2.real_name AS buyer_name ,t.`status` FROM trade_order t,user_info u,user_info u2 WHERE t.seller_id = u.id AND t.buyer_id = u2.id and
1=1 ORDER BY t.create_date DESC,`status` ;

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT SUM(t.order_total) as buyer_sum,count(*) as buyer_count,u.real_name,u.contact,u.id,t.trade_date FROM trade_order t,user_info u WHERE t.buyer_id = u.id AND
u.real_name = #{real_name} and
t.trade_date >=#{create_date_start} and t.trade_date <=#{create_date_end} and t.`status`=2 GROUP BY u.id) a, (SELECT SUM(t.order_total) as seller_sum,count(*) as seller_count,u.real_name,u.contact,u.id FROM trade_order t,user_info u WHERE t.seller_id = u.id AND u.id!=1376 AND u.id!=1378 AND
u.real_name = #{real_name} and
t.trade_date >=#{create_date_start} and t.trade_date <=#{create_date_end} and t.`status`=2 GROUP BY u.id) b WHERE a.id = b.id

SELECT a.id,a.real_name,a.contact,a.buyer_sum,a.buyer_count,b.seller_sum,b.seller_count,a.trade_date FROM (SELECT SUM(t.order_total) as buyer_sum,count(*) as buyer_count,u.real_name,u.contact,u.id,t.trade_date FROM trade_order t,user_info u WHERE t.buyer_id = u.id AND
u.real_name = #{real_name} and
t.trade_date >=#{create_date_start} and t.trade_date <=#{create_date_end} and t.`status`=2 GROUP BY u.id) a, (SELECT SUM(t.order_total) as seller_sum,count(*) as seller_count,u.real_name,u.contact,u.id FROM trade_order t,user_info u WHERE t.seller_id = u.id AND u.id!=1376 AND u.id!=1378 AND
u.real_name = #{real_name} and
t.trade_date >=#{create_date_start} and t.trade_date <=#{create_date_end} and t.`status`=2 GROUP BY u.id) b WHERE a.id = b.id ORDER BY a.trade_date DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into order_info (id, order_code, trade_no, order_total, goods_count, delivery_type, delivery_fee, user_id, user_name, status, create_date, update_date, pay_time, pay_code, pay_type, team_id, contact, address_id, point_id, receive_date, refund_amount, order_desc) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into order_info
id,
order_code,
trade_no,
order_total,
goods_count,
delivery_type,
delivery_fee,
user_id,
user_name,
status,

contact,
address_id,
point_id,
receive_date,
refund_amount,
order_desc,
goods_total,
vip_order,
vip_fee,
refund_date,

mapper.update:
update order_info
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_total = #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point_id = #{pointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_desc = #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_total = #{goodsTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vip_order = #{vipOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_fee = #{vipFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
refund_date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_info set order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_total = #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, point_id = #{pointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_desc = #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from order_info where
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
trade_no = #{tradeNo} and
status = #{status} and
1=1

select
from order_info where
trade_no = #{tradeNo} and
status = #{status} and
1=1 order by update_date desc

select o.*,u.header from order_info o, user_info u where o.user_id = u.id and
o.user_id = #{userId} and
o.team_id = #{teamId} and
o.status = #{status} and
o.type = #{type} and
1=1 order by o.update_date desc

select count(o.user_id) from order_info o, user_info u where o.user_id = u.id and
o.user_id = #{userId} and
o.team_id = #{teamId} and
o.status = #{status} and
o.type = #{type} and
o.team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1 order by o.update_date desc

select o.*,u.header from order_info o, user_info u where o.user_id = u.id and
o.user_id = #{userId} and
o.team_id = #{teamId} and
o.status = #{status} and
o.type = #{type} and
o.team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1 order by o.update_date desc

select count(1) from order_info where
user_id = #{userId} and
team_id = #{teamId} and
status = #{status} and
team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1

select DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, SUM(order_total) order_total, count(1) num from order_info where
update_date >= #{start_time} and
#{end_time} >= update_date and
user_id = #{userId} and
team_id = #{teamId} and
status = #{status} and
team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d')

select DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, count(DISTINCT user_id ) num from order_info where
update_date >= #{start_time} and
#{end_time} >= update_date and
status = #{status} and
team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d')

select count(DISTINCT user_id ) num from order_info where
update_date >= #{start_time} and
#{end_time} >= update_date and
status = #{status} and
team_id in (#{teamIdStr}) and
1=1

select sum(order_total) order_total,
(SELECT count( * ) FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM order_info GROUP BY user_id ) aa) num,
( SELECT count( * ) FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM order_info GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT( * ) = 1 ) aa) newnum from order_info where
update_date >= #{start_time} and
#{end_time} >= update_date and
status = #{status} and
team_id =#{team_id} and
1=1

select sum(order_total) order_total from order_info where
status = #{status} and
team_id =#{team_id} and
1=1

SELECT count(*) FROM team_browse WHERE user_id not in ( SELECT user_id FROM order_info WHERE
team_id=#{team_id} and
1=1 GROUP BY user_id ) and
team_id=#{team_id} and
1=1

SELECT count(*) FROM order_info WHERE user_id not in ( SELECT user_id FROM order_info WHERE
team_id=#{team_id} and
1=1 GROUP BY user_id ) and
team_id in (#{teamStr}) and
1=1
